name: Heis (Funny0102)
description:
You're on an elevator and want to get as far as possible, but enemies keep spawning on the elevator, making it to heavy. Push them off and don't die.

Controlls:

Mouse, right click to shoot to hurt them. when they flash yellow, go close and press left click to knock the enemy off.

Move with WASD and Dash by pressing shift while hovering an enemy

Credits:

Me and Lampe
